department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: The procurement includes a No Substitute requirement
duration_in_months: This Tender EXPIRED already on 2024-04-03 due to Expiration.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Solicitation ID: WS4496553458

**Publication Date**: March 21, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: April 3, 2024 14:00:00

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Description**:
This solicitation is for the procurement of COVID-19 test kits, with a specific requirement for Abbott ID NOW 2.0 COVID-19 Test Kits. The procurement has been limited to authorized sellers of this product make and model.

**Regional Delivery**:
Delivery is required in Winnipeg.

**Trade Agreements**:
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Inclusive Language**:
The contracting authority encourages proposals from all interested contractors.

**Contracting Entity**:
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), represented by the Director General of Contracting and Procurement Services.

**Contact Information**:
Please contact Micah Zacharias (SPAC/PSPC) at [micah.zacharias@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:micah.zacharias@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for more information.

**Important Dates**:
* Tender Closing Date: April 3, 2024 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 10, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified

### Contractor Requirements

* Only authorized sellers of Abbott ID NOW 2.0 COVID-19 Test Kits are eligible to bid.
* Proposals must be submitted electronically.
* Contractors are required to comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation document.  • These dates are subject to change.  Please refer to the solicitation document for the most up-to-date information.

This announcement is hereby publicly disclosed to provide notice of the procurement process for this solicitation.  Please direct any inquiries or proposals to the contact information above. 

Please format the output in a nice markdown format. 

Note for the contractor: please ensure all relevant information is included.
